Blacksmith Kincaid:
I`m Kincaid responsible for teaching the dwarven race. I`ll tell you about characteristics and slills of certain dwarven classes, so listen closely.
The *Dwarven fighter* crafts items from materials acquired from monsters. If you want to improve your power with pure capital, this would be the class fo you.
And yes, you`ll have new skills. Your skill window will *open automatically* when you press *ALT+K*, showning the full list of skills you have.
